name: Fuwaru the Apprentice
description: "Minarai Mahoutsukai Fuwaru no Bouken" or The Adventures of Fuwaru Apprentice Wizard" is a fun platformer. You must collect coins and items within each level. Packed with magic support, you'll fight the bosses at the end of each world. A nice game that unfortunately has a story that is in Japanese, but this will not stop anyone from playing and enjoying this game.
